instructions: Open the Activity app on your iPhone. Tap the History tab to see details about your all day activity. On the calendar, a green dot appears next to the days that you worked out. To see more detail, tap a day. To get information about a workout, such as your route or total distance, tap the Workouts tab, then tap the item.*
On your iPhone, open the Apple Watch app. Tap the My Watch tab, then tap Activity. Choose your notifications and reminders. For example, coaching notifications are based on your previous progress.
